values

mapper.update:
update task_cookie_config
task_cookie_config.task_config_main_id = #{TaskConfigMainId},
task_cookie_config.domain_id = #{DomainId},
task_cookie_config.key = #{Key},
task_cookie_config.value = #{Value},
task_cookie_config.expiration = #{Expiration},
task_cookie_config.create_time = #{CreateTime}

mapper.select:
